bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Edward Thomas Heriot was a prominent planter and slaveowner of Georgetown (Georgetown County), South Carolina.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection contains Heriot's letters describing his trip to Great Britain, his voyage across the Atlantic to New York, his railroad trip to South Carolina, personal affairs, and his various estates and slaves. Also included is a defense of slavery and a criticism of abolition, Harriet Beecher Stowe, and Fredrika Bremer.
